column12: Well, that was the last pre-lab!  I hope that you learned some important pieces of chemistry from doing these pre-labs.  They were not designed to teach you everything or make your labs flawless, but simply to give you one step into the experiment before you stepped foot into the lab.  I saw a lot of progress this semester!  Thank you!  And with that, give a shout of "hooray!"  We're finished with pre-labs (for the semester)!
Hey, thanks for encouraging Augustine to wear proper PPE!  I believe comments like that can be much more powerful from fellow students rather than from the instructor.
